articles.title: Ask the remodeler: What to know about adding a deck, porch, or patio to your home
articles.description:
Don’t have an outdoor gathering space? Winter is the time to start planning.

The post Ask the remodeler: What to know about adding a deck, porch, or patio to your home appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Plan outdoor spaces like decks or patios this winter for summer gatherings.
Local remodelers suggest starting projects now to avoid summer rush.
Adding outdoor areas can increase home value and enhance community engagement.

Only true Patriots fans will know these answers.

summary: Engage with Patriots' Super Bowl history through an interactive quiz.

Strengthen community ties by celebrating local sports heritage and fan engagement.

articles.title: Patriots star Christian Gonzalez has a big fan in Bruins legend Zdeno Chara
articles.description:
"The love they show, just how we’re all intertwined, and everybody has such a great relationship with everybody."

The post Patriots star Christian Gonzalez has a big fan in Bruins legend Zdeno Chara appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bruins legend Zdeno Chara publicly supports Patriots star Christian Gonzalez.
Chara emphasizes strong relationships among Boston sports teams and players.
This camaraderie boosts local sports culture and community pride in Boston.

articles.title: Inside the origin of the Patriots’ ‘road warriors’ rallying cry
articles.description:
"I think you embrace it when you try to build an identity, and you carry it on the road with you."

The post Inside the origin of the Patriots’ ‘road warriors’ rallying cry appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots embrace 'road warriors' identity to strengthen team morale during away games.
The rallying cry originated during the 2026 Super Bowl preparations against the Seahawks.
This identity aims to unify Boston fans and enhance support during challenging away matches.

articles.title: Did you follow the local news this week? Take our Greater Boston news quiz.

summary: Participate in the Greater Boston news quiz to test local knowledge.
